Love this pier! Such a beautiful little walk to take during a sunset. However, the pier has been blocked off halfway down due to repairs.
The pier isn't exactly a destination but its been rebuilt and is a focal point in the community. Most community events are around the pier area. Its a must see if you're in Cayucos
Very quaint and the view of the surfers is interesting. We went there at sunset and watched the green flash!

Great for taking pictures of the sunset with the pier or from the pier. Pier has been updated and is nicely fixed up.
Pier is well maintained and apparently recently restored, maybe by support/donations from the local community. People were fishing from the end of the pier. Did not visit at... read more
The pier is closed due to poor structural quality. Save the Pier!! such a beautiful structure! This picture was taken from the backdoor of my motel room at Shoreline Inn.
This is a great place to take a short walk and look at the beach and ocean, but it will be a full five-star once the repairs are done. They're scheduled to start in August 2014.
Love the pier, the little chocolate shop and browsing the antique shops. Bright sunny day was perfect to walk the little town. John & LynNita Ellis

Walked the pier. Great place to see the surfers, fisherman and get a good look at Morro Rock. Not crowded at all on a December morning.
Great spot to enjoy the sunset in Cayucas! It is under repair so should be back to its former glory soon.
Nice beach and lots to see. The bike riding in town is very safe and lunch at the Smoke shack is a must.
Walked to the pier one afternoon. It looks recently rebuilt. Great place to take photos of the coastline.

It's exactly what you'd expect in a Saloon - drinks are cheap, lots of locals, and the decor is kitschy. Enjoy it for what it is!

Old Creek Ale House.knownFor: “ Good Beer ” Reviewed December 19, 2013 My wife and I were in Cayucos for a couple of days and wanted to watch The Ducks game. This place was happy to put the game on and the selection of beer was incredible. No food but they let us bring in food from one of the local restaurants. Good atmosphere and nice people. I'll definately go back. Helpful? Thank us2alwaysmovin Report
